input.activity_signal: Missouri Public Service Commission document shows Star2Star formally requesting "cancellation of its authority as granted in DA-2018-0246 effective January 1, 2025" and stating they are "ceasing to exist as a VoIP provider." FCC filing was from 2020 with no recent activity since then.
input.product_summary: Star2Star provided unified communications solutions including voice, video, fax, instant messaging and presence management for businesses of all sizes, with recognition as a Top 10 Hosted Business VoIP/UC Provider by IHS and inclusion in Gartner Magic Quadrant for UCaaS.
